translations.chinese: 詔諸侯王議可立為燕王者，長沙王臣等請立子建為燕王。
translations.english: He commanded the feudal lords to discuss who could be established as King of Yan. King Changsha and others requested establishing son Jian as King of Yan.

translations.chinese: 詔曰：「南武侯織亦粵之世也，立以為南海王。」
translations.english: The edict said: "Marquis Nanwu Zhao Zhi is also of Yue lineage. Establish him as King of Nanhai."

translations.chinese: 三月，詔曰：「吾立為天子，帝有天下，十二年于今矣。
translations.english: In the third month, the edict said: "I have established myself as Son of Heaven and emperor of the world. It has been twelve years to now.

translations.chinese: 與天下之豪士賢大夫共定天下，同安輯之。
translations.english: Together with the world's heroic scholars and worthy grand masters I pacified the world and jointly settled it.

translations.chinese: 其有 功者上致之王，次為列侯，下乃食邑。
translations.english: Those who have merit, the highest become kings, next become marquises, lowest receive fiefs.
